Denser_Summary: This app has many issues, according to user reviews.  Many users have experienced problems with the app's functionality, such as glitches and bugs that interfere with their ability to use the app effectively.  In addition, there are reports of scams and fraudulent activity within the app, leading to negative experiences for some users.  Some users also report encountering underage users on the platform, raising concerns about safety and security.  The app's customer support is also criticized for being unresponsive and unhelpful, leaving users feeling frustrated and ignored when they encounter problems.

User reviews reveal significant issues within the app.  Bugs and glitches disrupt functionality, while scams and underage users compromise safety.  Many express frustration with unresponsive customer support.  The app also negatively impacts users' self-esteem, particularly men, due to the prevalence of bots and scam accounts.  Payment issues and problems with the distance zone feature further detract from user experience. These combined problems create a negative experience for many users.

Numerous problems plague this app, impacting user experience and safety.  Bugs, scams, and underage users are frequently reported.  Unresponsive customer support exacerbates these issues.  Many accounts are banned without explanation, causing frustration and financial loss.  Lack of communication from matches and the prevalence of fake profiles further diminish the app's effectiveness. These problems create a negative experience for many users.

This app faces widespread criticism due to various issues.  Functionality is hampered by bugs, scams, and underage users.  Customer support is inadequate.  Many users experience unexplained account bans and payment problems.  Fake profiles, lack of communication, and verification problems are common.  Inappropriate content and algorithm issues further compound the negative user experience.

Widespread issues plague this app.  Bugs, scams, underage users, and unresponsive customer service are frequently cited.  Unexplained account bans and payment problems are common.  Fake profiles and lack of communication from matches are prevalent.  Verification issues, inappropriate content, and algorithm flaws further detract from user experience. Sexual blackmail, transphobia, and lack of an appeals process add to the negative experiences.
